nodes.bodyText: A private method does not need to be synchronized if the upper level public method is
Add this synchronized keyword due to a findbug warning in brazil
At some point we need to change the name of this class. This is not dummy but the actual entry point to the RCA framework
I think we should add a class level javadoc comment saying what are the tables in the SQLite database and what are the columns for each. And also add an example tables filled with data for each
done. Added to class level javadoc of each summary class.
Please add a javadoc comment for the public method while we are at it

nodes.bodyText: Can the list contain values other than strings ?
Yes, we can have Double and Integer as well.
Let's not try to hand roll json here and use a JSONObject or some library to do it.
done
If this is the name of the column, can we add the unit of measure to the name of the column so "time_period_seconds" ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,6 +30,13 @@ * HotResourceSummary contains information such as the name of the hot resource, the current value * threshold, etc. It also contains the top K consumers of this particular resource. It is created * by some RCAs who work directly on some type of resource(JVM, CPU etc.) + * + *

This object is persisted in SQLite table + * Table name : HotResourceSummary + * + *

schema : + * | ID(primary key) | Resource Type | Threshold | Value | Avg | Min | Max | Unit Type | Time Period |ID in HotNodeSummary(foreign key)

nodes.bodyText: done. changed it to time_period_seconds
